ip-type.description: Log server address type, IPv4 or IPv6.

ipaddress.description: Log server address, IPv4 or IPv6 type.

vrf-name.description: VPN name on a log server.

host-name.description: Configure host name of log server.

level.description: Level of logs saved on a log server.

port.description: Number of a port recving logs.

facility-mask.description: Configure facility of the syslog host.

severity-mask.description: Configure severity of logs received by the syslog host.

buffer-size.description: Size of a log buffer, the maximum value is configured by the PAF.

suppress-enable.description: Enable/disable suppression function of duplicate logs.

interface-name.description: Name of a log host interface sending logs.

logbuffer-enable.description: Enable/disable log buffer to output information.

trapbuffer-enable.description: Enable/disable trap buffer to output information.

packet-priority.description: Set the priority of the syslog packet.

delay-suppress-enable.description: Enable/disable event delay suppress is enabled.

event-logging-all.description: Enable/disable logging flag of global event.

info-center-sources.description: List of rules in channel for outputting information.

info-center-source.description: Configure rule in channel for outputting information.

feature-name.description: Feature name of the filtered log.

domain-server.description: Configure the domain log sever that receives logs.

vrf-name.description: VPN name on a log server.

level.description: Level of logs saved on a log server.

server-port.description: Number of a port recving logs.

max-file-num.description: Maximum number of log files of the same type.

max-file-size.description: Maximum size (in MB) of a log file. The value range for log files is [4, 8, 16, 32], for security files is [1, 4], and for operation files is [1, 4].

direction-channels.description: List of mappings of output directions and channels of the information center.

direction-channel.description: Specify the relation of direction and channel.

current-message.description: Number of existing messages in the buffer.

dropped-message.description: Number of dropped messages in the buffer.

overwrite-message.description: Number of overwritten messages in the buffer.

channel-id.description: ID of channel bind to the buffer.

channel-name.description: Name of channel bind to the buffer.

module.description: Operational data of module name information item.

sequence.description: Sequence number of a queried log.

starttime.description: Query start time. The valid value range is after 1970-01-01.

endtime.description: Query end time. The valid value range is after 1970-01-01.

sequence.description: Sequence number of a queried trap.

securitybuffers.description: List of security of a log buffer.

securitybuffer.description: Operational data of the security of a log buffer item.
